info.name: meinestadt.de
info.description: was browsing around and realized there was no style for it
info.additionalInfo:
beta release

A color chooser is added, and therefor the style reached beta status - everything should be colored
13.06.2012: we reached beta status! color picker added
12.06.2012: a few more additions (weather) , changed main color to #0ff, for a better visibility for me to see flaws in the css positioning/coloring
05.06.2012: made all classes begin with "mt" apply the style, except those beginning with "mt-img" (too tired of finding a new div on a subpage with some new random name
04.06.2012: most of the site is syled already, replaced images with text, applied style also to a pages with external content
30.05.2012: replaced images with text - needs to be aligned yet
